SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Carrying something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries) from one room to another.

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Taking a bath without help.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: FAC100-Limit: Taking a Bath Without Help
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Taking a Bath Without Help

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Taking a shower.

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Talking while walking.

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking 50 steps/paces on flat ground at a normal speed without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walk 50 Steps

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking (faster than your usual speed) for 50 steps without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walk Fast 50 Steps

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking (faster than your usual speed) for 1/2 mile (almost 1 km) without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walk for 1/2 Mile

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking up 20 stairs (2 flights) without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walk Up 20 Stairs

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking 1/2 mile (almost 1 km) on flat ground at a normal speed without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walking 1/2 Mile

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking 10 steps/paces on flat ground at a normal speed without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walking 10 Steps

SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walking Fast 1 Mile

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank - Functional Limitation: Considering your shortness of breath over the past 7 days, rate the amount of difficulty you had when doing the following activities: Walking up 10 stairs (1 flight) without stopping.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walking Up 10 Stairs

SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: FACIT-Dyspnea Scale 33 Item Bank Version - Limit: Walking Up 5 Stairs
